Name: SIMULATTE - Coffee Shop Simulator
About the game: This game is a coffee shop Simulator. Are you hungry for cake, a smoothie or an orange? do you want to sit down and relax? maybe use your phone and take pictures? This simulator puts you into a realistic 3D coffee shop. have fun exploring the realism of 3D Sit near total strangers, ask them what they are eating and walk like a boss! One guy waits for his food, while you almost instantly get whatever you want, like a boss! It's a fantastic display: Fear the diner with the blank stare, typing on a notebook without power! Be amazed of the guy, who has always his hands up! The barista produces your order by sheer force of will. (The force is strong with this one)
